name: RunescapeOS - Notion Template
description: Immerse yourself back in the world of Runescape and track your real-life progress, level up and unlock rewards.Turn your goals into quests, keep track of your habits with Achievement Diaries, and add a dash of fun with the Squeal of Fortune.Included in this Notion template:Task Management System - WildyLevel system from Runescape - SkillsCalorie tracker and recipe database - CookingWorkout / Fitness tracker - StrengthHealth Tracker - HitpointsJournal - PrayerNotes - MagicGoals and Challenges - Q
features: Task Management System -Wildy; Level system from Runescape -Skills; Calorie tracker and recipe database -Cooking; Workout / Fitness tracker -Strength; Health Tracker -Hitpoints; Journal -Prayer; Notes -Magic; Goals and Challenges -Quests; Habit tracker -Achievement Diaries; Weekly and Monthly Review flows
